\newenvironment{Ventry}[1]%
{\begin{list}{}{\renewcommand{\makelabel}[1]{##1}%
\settowidth{\labelwidth}{#1}%
\setlength{\leftmargin}{\labelwidth}%
\advance\leftmargin by \labelsep}}%
{\end{list}}
